title: Houston Marines

content: quote: Originally posted by gypsysnipe: I'd suggest talking to a Recruiter in the Houston area, they may be able to help you. Good advice. My son would meet with them every week before he went off to Parris Island. The recruiters and often times, visiting Drill Instructors, would give them a heck of a work out to get them ready for the physical, and I'm thinking a slight portion of the mental part, of bootcamp. Don
